cont.entity_a: Wireless connection speed is significantly faster than Linksys. Requires daily reboots to maintain wireless connection. Full signal strength throughout the house. Range can be poor, requiring proximity for a stable connection. Connection issues with VPN and customer service is not helpful. Router's wireless portion freezes frequently. Packet loss and random reboots are issues. Signal strength weakens through obstacles.
cont.entity_b: VPN setup is unreliable, with frequent disconnections. Reliable for smaller installations and basic VPN setup. Lacks support for some VPN features. VPN connection setup is straightforward. Stable for site-to-site VPN with static and dynamic IPs.

cont.entity_a: 256-bit WEP encryption is appreciated. Security features include 256-bit WEP and MAC filtering.
cont.entity_b: Robust security features but requires technical knowledge for setup.

Configuration.comm: Easy to set up and configure.

cont.entity_a: Advanced firewall configuration, including time-based port opening. Setup pages are cryptic but manageable. Setup is easy and quick, taking less than 30 minutes. Installation is generally easy, but some tech support needed for Mac configuration. Easy to configure, with helpful ReadMe and FAQ. Setup wizard simplifies configuration.
cont.entity_b: Inexperienced users may cause configuration issues. Good for blocking pages and remote access configuration. User-friendly web interface.

cont.entity_a: Firmware and drivers not optimized for 22 Mbps mode. Firmware upgrade required to resolve connection issues. Firmware upgrade improves stability and performance. Firmware upgrades necessary for optimal performance. Firmware updates improve speed and stability. Router is stable with latest firmware.
Router has good value for its price.
Router provides strong signal with external antenna.
cont.entity_b: Load balancing enhances web browsing speed.

cont.entity_a: Problems with PCMCIA card recognition and DHCP server failure after five months.
cont.entity_b: Dual WAN option works inconsistently. Load balancing does not function as advertised with unstable ISPs. Issues with load balancing for secure connections. Port forwarding limitations exist. Not suitable for VOIP systems due to port issues. Not recommended for VOIP due to port closing issues.
